<NEW>

"Of course." Cryotek said, his optics darkening for a moment. "That is
something that we would all desire." Cryotek's optics brightened, "But
what are you attempting to build now . . . Unless you have found such
a base already or have the plans to build one?" He said as his optics
fastened on Hydras.

(TAG)
